data.title: McDonald's CEO says these 3 food trends will define 2026
data.description: Chris Kempczinski said fiber, sweet and spicy flavor combinations, and innovative drinks will reign supreme this year.
data.content:
Chris Kempczinski says he eats at McDonald's three to four times a week.Nuccio DiNuzzo/Chicago Tribune/Tribune News Service via Getty Images

data.author: Bloomberg
data.title: China bans cybersecurity products from top US, Israeli firms
data.description: Chinese companies’ use of such products could result in sensitive data being sent overseas or create other vulnerabilities for customers, says government directive
data.content: China has instructed companies in the country not to use cybersecurity products from American and Israeli firms including Palo Alto Networks Inc, Fortinet Inc and Check Point Software Technologies Lt… [+2160 chars]
